revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Foresee;FSE1ASLD-32G; |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNCPMML-XRNEE; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-CM256SM |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ROCK 3 Compute Module V1.3" and "20220326" :are silkscreened on board top.
{{See also|Radxa|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3566 Quad-Core @2.0GHz :SoC: ARM (Cortex-A55); NPU: 0.8 TOPS *GPU: ''Mali-G52'' (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 32GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Cypress]] CYW43455 :802.11bgn+ac (1T1R), BT 4.2 *Network: 1x GbE port (via connectors) *Power Source: 5V (via connectors)
===Models=== *Model: RM116-D1E0W, RM116-D2E8W, RM116-D4E16W, RM116-D8E16W, RM116-D8E32W :Rock Pi Model Difference - EUT NAME: Radxa CM3 • FCC ID: 2A3PA-RADXA-CM3 :All the model are the same circuit and RF module, except model names.
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/07/radxa-cm3-raspberry-pi-cm4-alternative/ ''Radxa CM3 – A drop-in Raspberry Pi CM4 alternative'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/radxa-cm3-is-an-rk3566-powered-drop-in-replacement-for-a-raspberry-pi-cm4/''Radxa CM3 is an RK3566-powered drop-in replacement for a Raspberry Pi CM4'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2021/pine64-and-radxas-new-pi-cm4-compatible-boards ''Pine64 and Radxa's new Pi CM4-compatible boards'' on '''Jeff Geerling''' blog]
